item.title: Starting Over
item.description:
I've been struggling for some time to find a correct structure for my blog, even considered, and still considering, to try a blogging platform.

So, I decided to start over for two reasons:

1.- I will now blog in english 2.- I don't like some of my old articles anymore

With some time, I'll make the ones I like available again, in english, so, I'll have to find some time to translate, until then, I hope you enjoy my new empty blog.

Cheers!
item.dc:creator: Israel Fermín Montilla
